text: My favourite album? It's got to be Whatever People Say I Am, That's What I'm Not, by the Arctic Monkeys.

richContent.accessibilityText: The album cover for Whatever People Say I Am, That's What I'm Not, by the Arctic Monkeys. It depicts a man smoking a cigarette, looking into the camera.

richContent.subtitle: The debut 2006 album by the Arctic Monkeys
richContent.title: Whatever People Say I Am, That's What I'm Not

text: Poor spelling and grammar, with lots of mistakes.
Being asked to share personal info.
An unexpected text or email, particularly from someone you don't know or wouldn't expect to hear from.
Being asked to keep it a secret.
Something that appears too good to be true - for example 'free money'.
Being pressured to make a decision.
An email address that looks like an official one, but isn't spelt quite right (i.e. @gooogle.com)
Anything asking for personal or financial information.
An email that seems to come from an official source, but looks strange / is asking for something that source wouldn't (usually money or personal info).
